name: Blood Bucket
description:
Blood Bucket is made for https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-118-vampires .

You must survive the hordes of Zombies by throwing deadly blood at them. Refill your blood using the taps at the sides of the level.

Controls:

WASD - Move Up, Left, Down and Right respectively.

E - Hold when next to a tap to buy blood.

Left Click - Throw blood to kill enemies.

Esc - Pause.
